column2: "A new Matter Board has formed. There are signs that things are wavering towards a balance."
"For everything obtained, something must be lost. But this is obvious."
"And yet, in this case, there are possibilities that must come to pass."
"That is something I and We hope you will find and accomplish."
"I and We believe that you will bring it to pass."
"Forgive me for not being able to provide you with enough information."
"I wish that you attain that which you seek."
"This is something where I and We disagree. For now, I ask for more time."
